Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_set_preference

The function AIL_set_preference controls certain internal parameters used by the MSS system.

S32 AIL_set_preference(
  U32 name,
  S32 value
);

In Parameters

name
specifies one of the MILES_PREFERENCES to set.
value
specifies the desired preference value.

Returns

The preference value which was previously in effect.

Discussion

See the Preferences section for information on the meaning of various preference names and the effects their preference values have on the MSS system and drivers.

Example files that use this function: SSTEST.C


Group: Preferences, System Services
Related Functions: AIL_allocate_sample_handle, AIL_allocate_sequence_handle, AIL_get_preference, AIL_set_sample_playback_rate, AIL_set_stream_playback_rate
Related Basic Types: MILES_PREFERENCES, S32, U32
Related FAQs: My sound is skipping on Win32 - what can I do?
